dashboard.title: Welcome to Prometheus OS
dashboard.description: Your open-source command center for creator promotion.

aiFactory.description: Generate text, images, and ideas using a conceptual suite of open-source AI models.

distributionHub.description: Simulate content scheduling, press release distribution, and email campaigns.

interactiveAI.title: Interactive AI

aiFactory.title: AI Factory
aiFactory.description: Generate multi-channel content for your creative work.

promptPlaceholders.social: e.g., My new single 'Midnight Train' is out on Friday!
promptPlaceholders.blog: e.g., The themes of loneliness in my new poetry collection.
promptPlaceholders.image: e.g., Album art concept: a lone astronaut on a neon-lit planet.
promptPlaceholders.audio: e.g., Lo-fi synthwave track with a melancholic mood.
promptPlaceholders.video: e.g., A cinematic shot of a rainy city street at night.

aiFactory.errorPrompt: Please enter a topic or description.
aiFactory.errorGenerate: Failed to generate {{tab}} content. Please try again.
aiFactory.videoStatusError: An error occurred while checking video status.
generatingMessages: Warming up the digital film crew...
This can take a few minutes. Time for a coffee break?
The AI is working its magic...
This is taking a bit longer than usual, but good things come to those who wait.
aiFactory.audioDescription: This simulates generating a short audio clip using the open-source model {{tool}}.
aiFactory.audioHowToRiffusion: Riffusion turns text prompts into spectrograms, which are then converted into audio. It excels at creating music loops and soundscapes.
aiFactory.audioHowToBark: Bark is a transformer-based model for generating realistic speech, music, and sound effects from text prompts.

distributionHub.title: Distribution Hub
distributionHub.description: Manage press releases, targeted submissions, and content schedules.

pr.placeholder: e.g., Announcing my debut novel 'The Last Starlight', out this fall.

submissions.placeholder: e.g., An indie-folk album about seasons changing, with acoustic guitar and vocal harmonies.

scheduler.placeholder: e.g., Build hype for the week leading up to my single release on Friday.

crm.title: CRM
crm.description: Manage your contacts and industry relationships.
crm.promptPlaceholder: Describe your niche, e.g., sci-fi author
crm.emptyState: No contacts to display. Add a contact or generate samples to get started.
crm.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this contact?

automation.title: Automation
automation.description: Design workflows to automate your marketing and promotion.

ideas.placeholder: e.g., Cross-post my new music releases everywhere.
ideas.errorPrompt: Please enter a goal for your automations.
ideas.emptyState: No workflows generated yet. Describe your goal to get started.

interactive.title: Interactive AI
interactive.description: Conceptualize AR/VR/MR experiences for your audience.
interactive.placeholder: e.g., A virtual gallery of my concept art, a 3D model of my main character...
interactive.errorPrompt: Please enter an idea for an interactive experience.

settings.title: Settings & Configuration
settings.description: Conceptually configure your Prometheus OS stack.

infoBox.title: The Power of Choice
infoBox.content: Prometheus OS is built on a foundation of free and open-source tools. This panel allows you to conceptually plan your ideal stack. The application will use default integrations, but this helps you architect your self-hosted or free-tier ecosystem.

steps.title: Welcome to Prometheus OS!
steps.description: This short guide will walk you through the key modules designed to superpower your promotional efforts. Let's get started!

steps.title: AI Factory
steps.description: Your content creation hub. Generate social media posts, blog ideas, promotional images, and even simulate audio and video concepts from a simple text prompt.

steps.title: Distribution Hub
steps.description: Plan and execute your outreach. Generate professional press releases, create targeted submission pitches for blogs and curators, and build a full 7-day content schedule.

steps.title: CRM
steps.description: Manage your professional network. Generate sample contacts for your niche, then add, edit, and organize your own media contacts, fans, and collaborators.

steps.title: Analytics
steps.description: Visualize your success. Generate a dynamic, simulated analytics report to understand campaign performance, audience sentiment, and top-performing content.

steps.title: Automation
steps.description: Work smarter, not harder. Get AI-powered ideas for marketing automation workflows and design your own conceptual flows using a drag-and-drop builder.

steps.title: Interactive AI
steps.description: Engage your audience on a new level. Brainstorm and conceptualize interactive experiences like AR filters or VR galleries, and generate concept art instantly.
